page.title: 12Aldershot Cricket Club
page.content: In{October 1947}the Aldershot Cricket Club was formed.Mr.John Astin is probably the last surviving original member. The club still has its{original ground.}Mr.Astin has been the President since 1976.He attends meetings and coaches the Colts. The runs several teams all of which play on Saturdays and Sundays.There are 3 colts teams for under 13's,under 15's, and under 17's as well as 3 adult teams. The club enters county and national competitions but has not won any this season. The club presents{trophies}to the best batsman and best bowler in each team every year.These trophies have been presented over the years by members of the club.Mr.Astin presented the cup for the 1st X1 batsman to commemorate his 25th year at the club.
